definition: east/host (i.e. sitting on east side of guest)/landlord
the West/abbr. for Spain 西班牙[Xi1 ban1 ya2]/Spanish

sentences.english: The gatekeepers were on the four sides: east, west, north and south.
sentences.chinese: 在东西南北，四方都有守门的。

sentences.english: In four quarters were the porters， toward the east， west， north， and south.
sentences.chinese: 在东西南北，四方都有守门的。

sentences.english: Thousands of mill strike also hard, ren erdong southwest north wind.
sentences.chinese: 千磨万击还坚劲，任尔东西南北风。

sentences.english: Its shape is almost round. The highway runs through the island from all directions.
sentences.chinese: 岛的形状基本呈圆形，东西南北公路贯通。

definition: east, south, west and north/all directions
the five directions 五方 east, south, west, north and middle
roads open in all directions (idiom); accessible from all sides

west/west side/western part/to the west of
north/north side/northern part/to the north of
